22201.en:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>Whaaaaa! Whaa haa haa!

22201.ja:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>「ふおーーーっ！　ふぉっふぉっふぉーっ！

22201.ko:

　못 당하겠구먼! 내가 졌다!<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22201.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>呼吼————！吼、吼、吼——！

<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>呼吼────！吼、吼、吼──！
我認輸──！是我輸了──！<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22202.en:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>Well, you're surprisingly strong.
You must be quite a fellow to best me
when I'm giving it my all.<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22202.ja:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>「いやはや　お前さん　強いのう～。
　本気を出した　わしに勝つとは
　たいしたヤツじゃあ。<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22202.ko:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>: 이것 참, 자네 정말 강하구먼~
　나와 정면으로 붙어서 이기다니
　보통 녀석이 아니군.<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22202.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>哎呀呀，你还真强呢～
竟然能赢过使出全力的我，
真是不简单。<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22202.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>哎呀呀，你還真強呢～
竟然能贏過使出全力的我，
真是不簡單。<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22203.en:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>So, why have you come all this way to see
me? Perhaps you have a question to ask?<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22203.ja:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>「して　こんな所へ　わざわざ来るとは
　わしに　聞きたいことでもあるんかあ？
　ん～？<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22203.ko:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>: 그런데 이 먼 곳까지 찾아오다니
　내게 묻고 싶은 것이라도 있는 거냐?
　응~?<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22203.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>所以，你特地跑来这种地方，
是有什么事想问我吗？
嗯～？<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22203.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>所以，你特地跑來這種地方，
是有什麼事想問我嗎？
嗯～？<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22204.en:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>Ah hello, it's nice to meet you, Mr. Holy Beast!
I am the Sage Anya and I have come to
speak with you. <stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22204.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「は…はじめまして　ダイキリンさまっ！
　私　賢者のアーニアといいまして……
　話を聞かせてもらいたいのは　私なんです！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22204.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: 아… 안녕하세요, 다이키린 님!
　전 현자 아니아라고 하는데요……
　묻고 싶은 게 있는 건 저예요!<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22204.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>您、您好，大麒麟大人！
我是贤者，名叫阿尼娅……
是我有事想要找您！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22204.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>您、您好，大麒麟大人！
我是賢者，名叫艾妮亞……
是我有事想要找您！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22205.en:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>...Huh? You're the one who wanted to see me?
What could a person like you possibly
want with me?<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22205.ja:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>「なぬ？　用があるのは　嬢ちゃんのほうか。
　ふ～む。お前さんみたいなのが　いったい
　この　わしに　何を聞きたいんじゃあ？<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22205.ko:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>: 뭐라? 질문이 있는 건 아가씨였나.
　흠~ 아가씨 같은 사람이
　나에게 대체 뭘 묻고 싶단 건가?<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22205.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>什么？要找我的人是小姑娘你啊。
哦～像你这样的小不点
究竟想问我什么呢？<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22205.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>什麼？要找我的人是小姑娘妳啊。
喔～像妳這樣的小不點
究竟想問我什麼呢？<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22206.en:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>Well, I want to be a great Sage, and I wanted
to get some pointers from you, you know
maybe learn a few spells...<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22206.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「えーと……　私　大賢者になりたくて
　ダイキリンさまの　お話を聞きたかったんです。
　だから　昔の呪文とか　そういうのを教えて……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22206.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: 그게…… 전 대현자가 꿈이라
　다이키린 님과 이야기를 나누고 싶었거든요.
　그러니 고대의 주문 같은 걸 알려 주셨으면……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22206.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>就是……我想成为大贤者，
所以来向大麒麟大人讨教，
希望您能教我一些以前的咒语之类的……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22206.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>就是……我想成為大賢者，
所以來向大麒麟大人討教，
希望您能教我一些以前的咒語之類的……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22207.en:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>No no no! You're saying you want to be a
great Sage?<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22207.ja:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>「んん～っ！？　いやっ　待て　待て～！
　嬢ちゃんが　大賢者になる？
　確かに　そう言ったのかあ？<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22207.ko:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>: 응!? 잠깐만 기다리게!
　아가씨가 대현자가 되겠다고?
　그렇게 말한 거 맞나?<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22207.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>嗯嗯～？！等一下等一下～！
你要成为大贤者？
小姑娘，你真的这么说？<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22207.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m12901 _normal m00001>嗯嗯～！？等一下等一下～！
妳要成為大賢者？
小姑娘，妳真的這麼說？<stop_lip_animation m12901 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22208.en:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>Well, yes. It's been a dream of mine since I was
a child to become great Sage. I even promised
my childhood friend that I would do it.<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22208.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「え？　は…はい。
　大賢者になるのが　小さいころからの夢で
